statements: SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT supplier_name, email, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (2, 3);
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id > 2 ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, email FROM suppliers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (2, 4, 6) ORDER BY supplier_name ASC, supplier_id DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_phone, supplier_address FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 50;
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM products WHERE product_id = 2;

SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email, supplier_phone, supplier_address FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3
SELECT product_name, product_price, supplier_name FROM products INNER JOIN suppliers ON products.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT product_name, product_description, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY product_price
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, price FROM suppliers JOIN products ON suppliers.supplier_id = products.supplier_id;
SELECT order_id, order_date, customer_name FROM orders WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY order_date DESC;

SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT p.product_name, o.quantity, o.order_date FROM products p INNER JOIN orders o ON p.product_id = o.product_id WHERE o.quantity > 10 ORDER BY o.order_date DESC

SELECT s.supplier_name, p.product_name, o.quantity FROM suppliers s INNER JOIN products p ON s.supplier_id = p.supplier_id INNER JOIN orders o ON p.product_id = o.product_id WHERE o.order_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_date, total_price FROM Orders WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, address FROM Suppliers JOIN Products ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Products.supplier_id ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;

SELECT supplier_name, contact_name, address FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
